Description: Pottery ostracon with part of one incised line, including the Jesus Christ monogram followed by Nika in Greek letters, with cord mark on shoulder, inside of rim painted black on top.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394079) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394079)
